00064 inline const QByteArray& CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::GetDocumentTypeId() const
00065 {
00066        return m_documentTypeId;
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 // inline protected methods
00071 
00072 inline bool CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::IsDocumentTypeSupported(const QByteArray& documentTypeId) const
00073 {
00074        return documentTypeId.isEmpty() || (documentTypeId == m_documentTypeId);     // default or the same type is accepted
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 inline bool CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::IsViewTypeSupported(const QByteArray& viewTypeId) const
00079 {
00080        return viewTypeId.isEmpty() || (viewTypeId == m_viewTypeId);   // default or the same type is accepted
00081 }
